description: Chipotle paste adds lots of smoky flavour to these lighter turkey enchiladas, bulked up with diced mushrooms for extra hidden veg.
name: Chipotle Turkey Enchiladas Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly grease a large baking dish, place a tortilla in, fill with turkey chilli, roll up and repeat until all the tortillas have been used. Top with grated cheddar, bake for 15 minutes until golden and bubbling and serve.
